title: Acts of the Apostles part 2 (Christian Sermon)
description:
Acts of the Apostles part 2 (Christian Sermon)


Study on Acts of the Holy Spirit (part 2 of 5).

Part 1 - Chapters 1 to 7
Part 2 - Chapters 8 to 14
Part 3 - Chapters 15 to 21
Part 4 - Chapters 22 to 28
Part 5 - Growth of Christianity in India and the whole World. 

Bible Study on Acts of the Apostles - chapters 8 to 14. Focus in Acts is on Prayer and the working of the Holy Spirit. This is FGAG Church in Indiranagar, one of the famous churches of Bangalore, South India. It is also one of the biggest Churches with 22,000 in attendance on Sundays and with 10 services throughout the day in English, Tamil and Hindi languages. The services between 6.00 am to 1.00 pm on Sundays are webcast live throughout India.

This church is unique in Bangalore because half of the people who attend the services today were not born christian; but have been touched by the power of the Holy Spirit and the Gospel of Jesus Christ.

This is also one of the richest churches in India. The tithes and offerings received by this church are used to support several churches in remote parts of North and West India where Christians make up less than 1% of the population. (Christians make up around 8-10% of the population in South India).

Runtime: 57 mins
Language: English
Year: Aug 2013
Quality: 8/10
Format: mp4 format 

"Don't ask me what Christ can do for you! He has done all he could. Tell me what you can do for Christ?"

Uploaded by Indian Christian
